Join the League of Women Voters of SF for a nonpartisan discussion about San Francisco's 13 ballot measures, including a sales tax to fund Caltrain, allowing 16 and 17-year-olds to vote in local elections, and issues such as affordable housing, policing, local businesses and more. All San Francisco residents are welcome to attend and learn more.
